definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: interest, usury (lit. something bitten off);—´[[נ]] abs. Ex 22:24 +; cstr. De 23:20; —c. [[שִׂים עַל־]] Ex 22:24 (E); c. [[לָקַח מִן]] Le 25:36, [[הֵשִׁיב מִן]] Ez Eze 18:17, [[לָקַח]] Eze 22:12 (no prep.), [[בְּנֶשֶׁךְ]] Le 25:37 at interest, so Ps 15:5, Ez Eze 18:8, Eze 18:13; ´[[בְּנ]] Pr 28:8 by usury; as acc. cogn. De 23:20, De 23:20, De 23:20.
